document.full_text: an ex-convict held for nearly two weeks as a suspect in the severe beating of a san francisco giants fan at dodger stadium was ordered on friday to remain jailed without bond on an alleged parole violation.
document.title: suspect in dodger stadium assault held in jail
lines_and_colors: an ex-convict held for nearly two weeks as a suspect in the severe beating of a san francisco giants fan at dodger stadium was ordered on friday to remain jailed without bond on an alleged parole violation.
